scripts.gsheets2img: bun install && bunx playwright install firefox && NODE_CONFIG_DIR=dev_tools/gsheets2img/config/ node dev_tools/gsheets2img/index.js
scripts.devtools: bun run submodule && bash dev_tools/install.sh && bun run dev_tools/runAllTools.ts && bash dev_tools/final.sh
scripts.start: bun run devtools && bun run build && bash dev_tools/open-link.sh http://localhost:4321/test_ecgc_2/ && astro dev
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .astro && rm -rf dist && bun update
